channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Winging it
item.description: Tech and culture have enabled a new sort of informality. Not simply the end of suits and ties and heels at work, but the office itself is fading away....

item.title: Can A German Bus Startup Really Make Greyhound Suck Less?
item.description: Flix snatched Greyhound from the brink. But can its European playbook help this 1-star-rated American “icon” turn the corner?

item.title: Secret recipes
item.description: “You can try this at home…” But you probably won’t. The secret recipe isn’t the reason Coke is successful. And the recipe for KFC isn’t much of a reci...

item.title: The reality of meliorism

item.title: AI Agents Could Finally Make Siri And Alexa Truly Useful
item.description: In the new year, advancements in AI and voice technology could fulfill a promise that tech giants have been making for more than a decade.

item.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence Or Artificial Identity?
item.description: When is artificial intelligence sophisticated enough to possess the traits to provide equality of a human and machine identity?

item.title: Pentagon Acquires AI-Powered Indoor Strike Drones

item.title: The Ultimate 2025 New Year’s Resolutions For Tech Leaders
item.description: This year, don’t just set goals—commit to transformative resolutions that will redefine your leadership and organizational success.

item.title: Find the others

item.title: Calendars are a choice
